ValidationRule.description: Validates that the account Physical State/Province is a valid two-character abbreviation if Physical Country is Australia
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(NOT( ISCHANGED( LastActivityDate )), NOT( ISCHANGED( Last_Activity_Type__c )), NOT( ISCHANGED( Last_Meeting_Date_Account__c )), NOT( ISCHANGED( Last_Meeting_Subject_Account__c )), NOT( ISCHANGED( Last_Meeting_Type_Account__c ) )) && AND ( ShippingCountry = "Australia", OR ( LEN(ShippingState) < 2, NOT ( CONTAINS("ACT:NSW:NT:QLD:SA:TAS:VIC:WA",ShippingState) )))
